References

  1. Jean’s website
  2. J. Daunizeau, V. Adam, L. Rigoux, VBA: A probabilistic treatment of nonlinear models for neurobiological and behavioural data, PLoS Comp. Biol. (2014), 10(1): e1003441
  3. L. Rigoux, K.E. Stephan, K.J. Friston, J. Daunizeau, Bayesian model selection for group studies - Revisited, Neuroimage (2014), 84: 971-985
  4. J. Daunizeau, K.J. Friston, S.J. Kiebel, Variational Bayesian identification and prediction of stochastic nonlinear dynamic causal models, Physica D: nonlinear phenomena (2009), 238: 2089-2118.
  5. K.J. Friston, J. Mattout, N. Trujillo-Barreto, J. Ashburner, W. Penny, Variational free-energy and the Laplace approximation, Neuroimage (2007), 34: 220-234.
  6. Optimizing experimental design for comparing models of brain function, J. Daunizeau, K. Preuschoff, K. J. Friston, K. E. Stephan, PLoS Comp. Biol. (2011), 7(11): e1002280
  7. Bayesian model selection for group studies, K. E. Stephan, W. D. Penny, J. Daunizeau, R. J. Moran, K. J. Friston, Neuroimage (2009), 46: 1004-1017.
